ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Highpass Keep
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Highkeep is notorious for attracting dumb players or rather it creates them. The total safety of the hunting there causes people to learn terrible
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Highkeep is notorious for attracting "dumb players" or rather it
creates them.

The total safety of the hunting there causes people to learn terrible group
tactics (or not learn any at all).

99% of the time if I find myself grouped with someone who levelled through
their upper 20's and lower 30's in highkeep I immediately leave the group.
It's not that ALL people who played there are bad, it's that most are.

No offense to anyone who's hunted there religiously but HK just isn't the
same as SolA or GukTop or Cazic.

Lyrn
----- Original Message -----
From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 11:06 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Highpass Keep

Regen.

to
> the guy and he said "Verant's is wrong - I know I tested it"...
>
> Slyde
>
